channel.title: New Non-Video Game project from Valve
channel.description:
[url]https://www.gametrailers.com/videos/6jublj/gt-tv-valve-on-gt-tv-this-thursday-[/url]
What do you guys think it will be. My bet is they are announcing something to do with their research into head mounted displays or it could be a movie like some people think.

item.title: New Non-Video Game project from Valve
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
Dalek:

Who needs 22 million dollars to make a movie with free software!?!?!? :fffuuu:

Rights and salaries make up a good chunk of movie budgets. It’s not simply the cost of physical things or software.

Read full topic
item.source: New Non-Video Game project from Valve

item.title: New Non-Video Game project from Valve
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
deadlife101:

This is quite interesting, my bets are on a Half-Life movie.

Oh man, Episode three is actually a movie.

The wailing and gnashing of teeth could be heard from all corners of the universe.

Read full topic

item.title: New Non-Video Game project from Valve
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Software costs are negligible with these things. The software doesn’t save big chunks of cash because it’s free, but because it cuts down on man hours. A lot.

$22 million is peanuts for a CGI movie.

Read full topic
item.source: New Non-Video Game project from Valve

item.title: New Non-Video Game project from Valve
item.dc:creator: Dalek
item.description:
SoloTimeParadox:

€18,700,000 for a movie that people can animate for free… I want a budget like that for when I make SFM movies.

Who needs 22 million dollars to make a movie with free software!?!?!? :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: New Non-Video Game project from Valve
item.dc:creator: ChancyWancy
item.description:
I don’t know how far the term “non-video game related” goes, but given that the term applies to actual video game projects only and not the supposed engines they’re built on, I’mma go ahead and place my bets on Source 2.

Or Steam for Linux as that’s been something they’ve been talking so much about recently.

Read full topic
